1.content: Light Cruisers have relatively high Anti-Air defenses.

2.content: Normal Battleships have high Firepower but move slowly...

3.content: If you manually aim your battleships' guns and land a bullseye, damage will be increased by 20%!

4.content: Use your carrier's air support to clear the screen of all enemy shells!

5.content: Shield-type skills can only block smaller ammo and cannot block shells from main guns, torpedoes, or aircraft attacks.

6.content: Your fighters will automatically intercept enemy aircraft, but are limited by a cooldown timer.

7.content: Anti-air guns attack all enemies within range and deal damage shared across the hit enemy aircraft.

8.content: Enemy ships and aircraft that penetrate your vanguard's defensive line (left side of the screen) will attack and deal damage to your main fleet.

9.content: Most battleships come equipped with a 140mm Secondary Gun.

10.content: Large ships have more auxiliary defenses. Be careful when launching torpedoes from close range!

11.content: Can't get through enemy defenses? Try using torpedoes and dive bombers to deal with large ships.

12.content: AP weapons can deal large amounts of DMG to heavy ships.

13.content: Use high explosive ammo for a chance to set enemy ships on fire.

14.content: Identical skills don't stack. Higher level skills have priority over lower level skills.

15.content: Fire another round of high explosive ammo after setting a target on fire to keep it burning for more damage!

16.content: Did you know that you can change your flagship while preparing for battle?

17.content: Single line increases damage, reduces evasion. Double line increases evasion, reduces damage. Circular is balanced and improves Anti-Air.

18.content: You choose whether or not to display custom ship names in 'Settings - Notifications - Other'.

19.content: Auto battle unlocks once you have cleared stage 1-3.

20.content: Merit you earn from exercises may be exchanged for various rewards in the Merit Shop.

21.content: There are three types of skills: Offensive (red), Defensive (blue), and Support (yellow).

22.content: The comfort level in the dorm is determined by the furniture and decorations you have collected.

23.content: Cargo ships only appear on the battlefield for a short amount of time. Make sure not to miss them!

24.content: Your ships will only earn 50% EXP if you send them to battle while their moods are low.
